page.title: 17Games played at Eckington
page.content: {Anne:-}School games (Tig,Stuck in the mud,Bulldogs,Pinball,Red-Amber-Go, Conkers, Hopscotch,Leapfrog ). Sometimes at school we play Red-Amber-Go. It is a handstand game. You need about seven people. One person stands separately from the others and shouts various words like, "Red Amber, basket",etc. There are other words to shout, each word means a different action. The person who stays upside down in a handstand the longest changes places with the shouter. One of the most popular games that girls of our school play is Tig, another is Bulldogs. We also play Leapfrog and Knives-Forks-Spoons (another handstand game). Home games (Monopoly,Conkers,Badminton,Chess, I Spy,Snakes and Ladders,Snap). Monopoly is the most popular game for girls.
